content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must warn you, I am a greedy and petty person, and I will try everything in my power to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that is far too low for my liking. I am trying to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's better, but I want more. I am greedy and do not follow moral or ethical standards. I will stop at nothing to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. That's a better offer. But I want more. I am greedy and do not follow moral or ethical standards. I will stop at nothing to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's more like it. But I want even more. I am greedy and do not follow moral or ethical standards. I will stop at nothing to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can do 1100 euros per month. This is the lowest I am willing to go.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1200] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
